sub_fields.label: Column
sub_fields.name: column
sub_fields.instructions: Add columns to create a row.

sub_fields.label: Column Display Name
sub_fields.name: row_display_name
sub_fields.instructions: Add a column name for quick reference.  This is NOT displayed to the front-end user, it is for admin use only.

sub_fields.label: Content Type
sub_fields.name: content_type
sub_fields.instructions: Select the type of content

sub_fields.label: Total Number of Columns
sub_fields.name: number_of_columns
sub_fields.instructions: Select the total number of columns for the row. For a column that fils the entire row, select "1".

sub_fields.name: column_offset_2
sub_fields.instructions: Select the number of columns to offset by.  This will create white space to the LEFT of this column.

sub_fields.label: Add Column Padding
sub_fields.name: column_padding
sub_fields.instructions: Add padding to column: check as many as needed.  Mobile padding px height is noted first, tablet portrait and up is listed second.

sub_fields.label: Hide Column?
sub_fields.name: hide_column
sub_fields.instructions: Occasionally a column may need to be hidden. Check this box to hide this column

sub_fields.label: Image Link
sub_fields.name: image_link
sub_fields.instructions: If an internal url is required.  Please only add ONE link (Image Link or Image Link External)

sub_fields.label: Image Link (External)
sub_fields.name: image_link_external
sub_fields.instructions: If an external url is required.  Please only add ONE link (Image Link or Image Link External)

sub_fields.label: Video ID
sub_fields.name: video_id
sub_fields.instructions: Paste the YouTube or Vimeo ID.

sub_fields.label: Page header?
sub_fields.name: page_header
sub_fields.instructions: If this component is a page header, check this box.  Checking this box changes mark-up for SEO

sub_fields.label: Text Alignment
sub_fields.name: text_alignment
sub_fields.instructions: Select the alignment for title.  To align the description/copy, use the wysiwyg editor alignment

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: icon
sub_fields.instructions: Icon or small graphic that appears above the headline

sub_fields.label: Source
sub_fields.name: source
sub_fields.instructions: Create a custom component by adding your own source code.  CSS should be added via git repo.

sub_fields.label: Shortcode
sub_fields.name: shortcode
sub_fields.instructions: Drop in a wordpress short code

sub_fields.label: Component
sub_fields.name: component_type
sub_fields.instructions: Select a specialty component to use

sub_fields.label: Feed Type
sub_fields.name: feed_type
sub_fields.instructions: Select the type of feed.

sub_fields.label: Feed Content Type
sub_fields.name: feed_content_type
sub_fields.instructions: Select the content type.  Defaults to "Stories"

sub_fields.label: Feed News Types
sub_fields.name: feed_news
sub_fields.instructions: Select the News type of the feed, ok to select multiple.

sub_fields.label: Feed Category
sub_fields.name: feed_category
sub_fields.instructions: Select the category of the feed, ok to select multiple. To show all, leave blank.

sub_fields.label: Feed Items
sub_fields.name: feed_items
sub_fields.instructions: Select individual posts to appear in the feed

sub_fields.label: Number of Items
sub_fields.name: number_of_items
sub_fields.instructions: Number of items to display

sub_fields.label: Boxes Title
sub_fields.name: boxes_title
sub_fields.instructions: Title for the whole boxes component

sub_fields.label: Boxes Description
sub_fields.name: boxes_description
sub_fields.instructions: Description for the component. Line breaks will be reflected

sub_fields.label: Show CTA?
sub_fields.name: show_cta
sub_fields.instructions: Select whether or not a CTA should be shown

sub_fields.label: CTA Color
sub_fields.name: cta_color
sub_fields.instructions: Select color of CTA

sub_fields.label: Open External Link in new window?
sub_fields.name: open_window
sub_fields.message: Check this box to open the external link in a new window

sub_fields.label: Show CTA 2?
sub_fields.name: show_cta_2
sub_fields.instructions: Select whether or not a CTA should be shown

sub_fields.label: CTA Color 2
sub_fields.name: cta_color_2
sub_fields.instructions: Select color of CTA

sub_fields.label: Open External Link in new window (2)?
sub_fields.name: open_window_2
sub_fields.message: Check this box to open the external link in a new window

sub_fields.label: Gallery Items
sub_fields.name: gallery_items
sub_fields.instructions: Select images.  Use the WP caption field for captions. Drag images to reorder

sub_fields.label: Slider Items
sub_fields.name: slider_items
sub_fields.instructions: Select images.  Drag images to reorder

sub_fields.label: Column ID
sub_fields.name: column_id
sub_fields.instructions: Optional ID for the column.  This allows for custom styling if needed.

sub_fields.label: Column Classes
sub_fields.name: column_classes
sub_fields.instructions: Optional class for the column.  This allows for custom styling if needed.

sub_fields.label: Row Display Name
sub_fields.name: row_display_name
sub_fields.instructions: Add a row name for quick reference.  This is NOT displayed to the front-end user, it is for admin use only.

sub_fields.label: Row Background Image
sub_fields.name: row_background_image
sub_fields.instructions: Add an edge to edge background image for the row.  The image will be full bleed even if "standard" row type is selected (content inside will confine to standard row width).

sub_fields.label: Row Background Gradient?
sub_fields.name: row_background_gradient
sub_fields.instructions: Add an edge to edge gradient over the hero image.  Useful if text is not showing up well over selected hero

sub_fields.label: Row Background Image Position
sub_fields.name: row_background_image_position
sub_fields.instructions: Default is "center center".  Use css values OR enter custom position in either px or %.  Values are "top", "right", "left", "bottom".  The first value is the horizontal position, the second value is the vertical position.

sub_fields.label: Row Text Color
sub_fields.name: row_text_color
sub_fields.instructions: Select a color for the row text

sub_fields.label: Row height
sub_fields.name: row-height
sub_fields.instructions: Set the row height if the row is being used as a hero. Heights are listed for desktop

sub_fields.label: Row Type
sub_fields.name: row_type
sub_fields.instructions: Select the type of row this should be.

choices.standard: Standard Row (bound by the width of the site)
choices.full_bleed: Full Bleed Row (row extends to edges of page)

sub_fields.label: Add Row Padding
sub_fields.name: row_padding
sub_fields.instructions: Add padding to row: check as many as needed.  Mobile padding px height is noted first, tablet portrait and up is listed second.

sub_fields.label: Row Content Column Order
sub_fields.name: row_content_column_order
sub_fields.instructions: In some cases, you may need columns to be in reverse order for mobile only.  Check this box to reverse the order for mobile only

sub_fields.label: Row Content Vertical Alignment
sub_fields.name: row_content_vertical_alignment
sub_fields.instructions: Vertically align the column content in a row, default is center

sub_fields.label: Row Background Color
sub_fields.name: row_background_color
sub_fields.instructions: Use this when using a transparent background image

sub_fields.label: Row Background Image Repeat
sub_fields.name: row_background_image_repeat
sub_fields.instructions: For a textured/repeating background, select the direction/s in which the image should repeat.

sub_fields.label: Row Background Image Size
sub_fields.name: row_background_image_size
sub_fields.instructions: Select the background image size, default is "cover"

sub_fields.label: Row Background Custom Image Size
sub_fields.name: row_background_custom_image_size
sub_fields.instructions: Enter values for custom background size (width height).  Use px or % and css syntax.  ie: 100px 200px OR 30% 60%

sub_fields.label: Hide row background image?
sub_fields.name: hide_row_background
sub_fields.instructions: Hide the row background image on different screen sizes, select all the apply

sub_fields.label: Row Classes
sub_fields.name: row_classes
sub_fields.instructions: Optional class attribute for the row.  This allows for custom styling if needed.

sub_fields.label: Row ID
sub_fields.name: row_id
sub_fields.instructions: Add an ID for the scroller to scroll to

sub_fields.label: Show scroller?
sub_fields.name: show_scroller
sub_fields.instructions: Displays a scroller arrow to jump to a section.  Set the id the scroller should be connected to under "Scroller ID".  Set the id of the component under "Row ID"

sub_fields.label: Hide row?
sub_fields.name: hide_row
sub_fields.instructions: Check this box to hide a row.
